IntroductionÂ¶

arginfer is a probabilistic method for inferring the Ancestral Recombination Graph (ARG). The method uses a Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) and samples from the posterior distribution of ARGs under the coalescent with recombination prior and infinite sites model of mutations.

Note

This documentation is currently under development.

arginfer
